name: snow-background
description: Animated snow effect for VS Code

snowBackground.windowsUsername.description: Your Windows username (required for WSL users). Leave empty for auto-detect on native Windows.

snowBackground.areas.description: Areas to show snow effect: editor, sidebar, panel, activitybar, or fullscreen

snowBackground.color.description: Snow color in RGB format (e.g., '255, 255, 255' for white)

snowBackground.cursorInteraction.description: Snowflakes are pushed aside by the mouse cursor

snowBackground.cursorRadius.description: Radius of cursor repulsion effect (in pixels)

scripts.vscode:uninstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),os=require('os'),path=require('path'),crypto=require('crypto');const rel=path.join('resources','app','out','vs','workbench','workbench.desktop.main.js');function fixChecksum(p){try{const pj=path.join(p,'..','..','..','..','product.json');if(!fs.existsSync(pj))return;const h=crypto.createHash('sha256').update(fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8')).digest('base64');let d=fs.readFileSync(pj,'utf8');const r=new RegExp('(\"vs\\/workbench\\/workbench\\.desktop\\.main\\.js\":\\s*\")([^\"]+)(\")');if(r.test(d)){d=d.replace(r,'$1'+h+'$3');fs.writeFileSync(pj,d,'utf8');}}catch{}}function find(d){const ps=[];try{const dp=path.join(d,rel);if(fs.existsSync(dp))ps.push(dp);fs.readdirSync(d).filter(e=>/^[0-9a-f]{6,}$/.test(e)).forEach(e=>{const hp=path.join(d,e,rel);if(fs.existsSync(hp))ps.push(hp);});}catch{}return ps;}const dirs=[];if(process.platform==='win32'){const l=process.env.LOCALAPPDATA||path.join(os.homedir(),'AppData','Local');dirs.push(path.join(l,'Programs','Microsoft VS Code'),'C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft VS Code');}else if(process.platform==='linux'){try{if(fs.readFileSync('/proc/version','utf8').toLowerCase().includes('microsoft')){const u='/mnt/c/Users';if(fs.existsSync(u)){fs.readdirSync(u).filter(x=>!['Public','Default','Default User','All Users'].includes(x)&&!x.startsWith('.')).forEach(x=>dirs.push('/mnt/c/Users/'+x+'/AppData/Local/Programs/Microsoft VS Code'));}dirs.push('/mnt/c/Program Files/Microsoft VS Code');}}catch{}dirs.push('/usr/share/code');}else if(process.platform==='darwin'){dirs.push('/Applications/Visual Studio Code.app/Contents/Resources');}dirs.flatMap(find).forEach(p=>{try{let c=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8');if(c.includes('SNOW-BACKGROUND-START')){c=c.replace(/\/\* SNOW-BACKGROUND-START \*\/[\s\S]*?\/\* SNOW-BACKGROUND-END \*\//g,'');fs.writeFileSync(p,c,'utf8');fixChecksum(p);}}catch{}});"
